alert.note: Alert for Grant (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Aberdeen (Northern and Northeastern South Dakota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 14 at 9:37AM MDT until further notice by NWS Aberdeen
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Broadway Avenue affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Above Lake Kampeska affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Florence affecting Grant County. Big Sioux River Near Castlewood affecting Hamlin County. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River at Watertown Sioux Conifer Road affecting Codington County. Big Sioux River Near Watertown affecting Codington County. .Warm temperatures will melt snowpack and increase river flows. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Major flooding is occurring. This approaches the flood of record. * WHERE...Big Sioux River Near Florence. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, The water reaches the bottom of the bridge 1 mile north of the gauge * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 9.1 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM CDT Friday was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/abr. The next statement will be issued Saturday evening by 630 PM CDT.
